post.title: Godmorgon
post.summary:
Godmorgon alla bloggish läsare, ni är guld värda! Vaknade precis upp och insåg kaoset att jag måste duscha och raka mig.. orkade inte göra det igår så gör det idag istället, äckligt va?
Ska straxt gå och äta lite frukost för att sedan ge mig ut med kameran och dra en photoshot med Dorre och hans polare! (Doerak aka Dorre är en hund..) Kommer komma upp massa bilder på bloggen senare antar jag, bara för jag och ni som läser är sjukt pro. Ska även ringa telia idag och försöka lösa vårat nätverksproblem.. Pingade 2667 ms när jag spelade LoL igår, gick inte att spela alls. Hade även problem med Spotify och att kolla på youtube videos.. inte ett dugg roligt.
Hade det jättebra i Stockholm. Stortjejen Tove fyllde 3 år, dom börjar bli så stora.. Känns som jag börjar bli typ 70+ eller något, GILF. Jaja.. nu ska jag ta på mig strumpor och gå ner för att fixa lite med kameran och äta frukost. Ser ut som det blåser ute idag med, FML.
Bilder från tidigare photoshot under!

post.title: “QUE LLUEVA” TERCER SENCILLO PROMOCIONAL DE ALFRED GÓMEZ JR de #Anzoategui, YA EN RADIOS A NIVEL NACIONAL.”
post.summary:
El cantante y compositor venezolano ALFRED GÓMEZ JR, lanza a radios a nivel nacional el tema “Que Llueva” tercer corte promocional de su más reciente trabajo discográfico.
“Simple” segundo larga duración con 11 temas de su autoría, se ha convertido en unos de los discos revelación del último trimestre del año 2012, logrando excelentes comentarios por parte de la prensa especializada y dejando colar en las emisoras más importantes del target alrededor del país los ya reconocidos “Ni un Momento” y “Si es Amor”.
Con su estilo Pop Soul, ALFRED GÓMEZ JR enamora nuevamente al oyente con la canción “Que Llueva”, un tema esperanzador, portador de bienestar y de amor.
“Que Llueva es una de las canciones más especiales, fue de las primeras que escribí para este disco, incluso trabajamos 4 versiones diferentes antes de llegar a la definitiva” comenta Alfred sobre el proceso de grabación, la mezcla fue realizada en Nice, Francia por Nick Dawes y la masterización en New York por Adrian Morgan reconocido por sus trabajos con DIDO, JAY Z, The Roots, D’Angelo, entre otros.
ALFRED GÓMEZ JR es un artista de gran calidad musical que va abriéndose camino a pasos agigantados en el mercado nacional, poseedor de una fresca e inconfundible voz y un estilo que poco a poco sus seguidores van reconociendo como una marca registrada. Con el lanzamiento a radio de su tercer sencillo, el 2013 promete ser un año exitoso lleno de sorpresas, donde su música llegará a diferentes ciudades del país en una serie de conciertos que próximamente serán anunciados.
Para más información de ALFRED GÓMEZ JR, actualizaciones y fechas de conciertos, visitar la página oficial www.alfredgomezjr.com | www.facebook.com/agjrmusic | Twitter: @alfredgomezjr
Enlace para escuchar y descargar el sencillo "Que Llueva" http://alfredgomezjr.bandcamp.com/track/que-llueva
“SIMPLE” disponible a la venta en Itunes, Amazon, Spotify y CD Baby.
"Que Llueva" disponible para reproducción y descarga en alfredgomezjr.com _________________________________________
Gracias por leernos...los invitamos a visitar http://www.culturasubterranea.comli.com/

post.title: Morberg Collection Pers Lilla Röda Tempranillo 13,5% (nr 2743)
post.summary:
Åt igår en riktigt smarrig skinkpaj som frugan hade tillagat och till denna goda gourmerätt öppnades en kicki_danielsson-festis av herr Morbergs egna vinkollektion. Detta bag-in-box-vin hade inhandlats av den enda enkla anledningen att vi båda gillade det förra vinet i serien och som vi tidigare har smakat. Morberg Collection Pers Lilla Röda Tempranillo 13,5% (nr 2743) 239 kr Spainen
SB’s notering: “Kryddig, bärig, aningen bränd smak med inslag av mogna jordgubbar, skogsbär, muskot och vanilj.” Mitt omdöme: Frisk, fruktig och ganska lätt doft som inbjuder till att vilja smaka på detta rubinröd vinet som är gjort på den aromatiska druvan Temperanillo. Upplever vinet mycket fylligt, med en god krydda och med flera smaker av röda bär. Till en börja känns vinet ganska lätt men ändrar karaktär efter en liten stund “ute i det fria” och känns något strävigare och med mera kraftfull smak. Tycker Morbergs Lilla Röda smakar riktigt bra och har en trevlig fruktsyra. För högre poäng vill jag för min del ha ett vin med ännu längre eftersmak och med ännu mera tyngd. Möjligen kan en ännu tyngre kött- eller fågelrätt tillföra en del även om jag tyckte att det gifte sig fint med denna något lättare skinkpajen… Ett mycket gott, bra och smakrikt boxvin med andra ord! Bör testas.
Se hela Spotify-listan med allt TUNGGUNG!

post.title: PETER JÖBACK TILL BROADWAY!!
post.summary: Det är med stor glädje och stolthet jag kan berätta att Peter Jöback i vår kommer att stå på scenen på Broadway i New York! Efter att ha triumferat i titelrollen som ”The Phantom of the Opera” på Her Majesty’s Theatre i London’s West End förra året får Peter ta på sig masken igen – denna gång på än mer klassisk mark: Broadway New York. I år firar Broadway-versionen av musikalen 25 år och i den jubileumsföreställning som gick av stapeln i lördags var Peter en av fyra Phantoms som överraskade den specialinbjudna publiken i en grandios final. Där presenterades det också att näste Phantom där blir svensk; Peter Jöback får detta unika uppdrag på The Majestic Theatre i Broadway, New York . Han blir dessutom den förste europé som innehaft rollen på Broadway sedan Michael Crawford gjorde den förste Phantom för 25 år sedan. ”Det är en stor ära för mig att få spela Phantom på Broadway” säger Peter. Kan inte tänka mig en bättre roll att göra min Broadway-debut med! Att dessutom få göra den under 25-årsjubiléet känns riktigt stort. 2012 var ett magnifikt år för Peter Jöback som startade med TV-serien ”Med hjärtat som insats på SVT, ”The Phantom of the Opera” på Her Majesty’s Theatre i London’s West End till jublande press och stående publikovationer. Sedan följde publiksuccén och den enormt hyllade arenaturnén ”I Love Musicals” under hösten. Till julen toppade Peter med jubileumsutgåvan av hans klassiska julskiva ”Jag kommer hem igen till jul” som hade 8 (!) miljoner streams på Spotify i december! Albumtiteln blev också titeln på Peters första bok som kom i november där han tillsammans med Lena Katarina Swanberg berättade om julskivan som katalysator i hans egen livsresa. Nu skriver vi 2013 och ett nytt fantastiskt år ligger framför Peter som just är på väg hem från jubiléet i New York. I början av april återvänder han för repetitioner och den 29 april gör han sin Broadway-debut och spelar fram till slutet av augusti.

post.title: digger dere!
post.summary:
hei<3 vil bare si at jeg digger dere! i går lå vi på 6. plass med 34 lesere og i dag ligger vi på 4.plass med 37! det er det meste jeg noen gang har hatt å jeg er så sykt glad. vi har blogget siden slutten av november tror jeg? vi laga bloggen i oktober, men begynte ikke å bruke den før lenge etterpå. jeg vil bare si tusen takk til alle dere lesere, men ønsker jo selvsagt at flere skal lese bloggen, men trenger hjelp..? kan ikke dere lesere anbefale bloggen våres til vennene deres? det hadde vært helt supert! må bare si det igjen å det er at jeg elsker quote<3 tusen, tusen takk for at dere leser bloggen våres! hjelp oss med å få flere lesere, med å hjelpe oss med tips om hva vi skal blogge om osv. elsker dere igjen! -Anne Marte<333

post.title: Joao Gilberto Astrud Gilberto Stan Getz Antonio Carlos Jobim – The girl from Ipanema Garota de Ipanema
post.summary: Listen to Joao Gilberto [+] Astrud Gilberto [+] Stan Getz [+] Antonio Carlos Jobim - The girl from Ipanema / Garota de Ipanema using spotify. If you can't find the tune on spotify try Grooveshark. About Joao Gilberto [+] Astrud Gilberto [+] Stan Getz [+] Antonio Carlos JobimJoão Gilberto (born João Gilberto Prado Pereira de Oliveira on June 10, 1931 in the town of Juazeiro, Bahia) is a Brazilian musician and considered one of the creators, with Antônio Carlos Jobim and Vinícius de Moraes, of bossa nova. A self-taught guitarist and singer, Gilberto moved to Rio de Janeiro in 1950 and joined the vocal group Garotos da lua ("The Boys of the Moon") as their lead singer. After a year and a half, he was kicked out of the group for his lack of discipline and spent the next several years in a marginal existence. Eventually he found his way, creating a new way to express himself in voice and on the guitar. The result of his obsessive experiments became known as bossa nova. Bossa nova is a refined version of samba, deemphasizing the percussive aspect of its rhythm and enriching the melodic and harmonic content. Rather than relying on the traditional Afro-Brazilian percussive instruments, bossa nova usually utilizes a drum set. João Gilberto often eschews all accompaniment, using only his guitar, which he uses as a percussive as well as a harmonic instrument. The singing style he developed is almost whispering, economical, and without vibrato. He creates his tempo tensions by singing ahead or behind the guitar. This style, which Gilberto introduced in 1957, created a sensation in the musical circles of Rio's Zona Sul, and many young guitarists sought to imitate it. It was first heard on record in 1958, when João Gilberto accompanied singer Elizete Cardoso in a recording of "Chega de Saudade", a song by Antonio Carlos Jobim and Vinicius de Moraes. Shortly after this recording, João Gilberto made his own debut single of the same song, followed by the 1959 LP, Chega de Saudade. The song became a hit, launching Gilberto's career and the bossa nova craze. Besides a number of Jobim compositions, the album Chega de Suadade featured older sambas and popular songs from the 1940s and '50s, all performed in the distinctive bossa nova style. This album was followed by two more in 1960 and 1961, by which time the singer featured new songs by a younger generation of performer/composers such as Carlos Lyra and Roberto Menescal. By 1962, bossa nova had been embraced by such North American jazz musicians as Herbie Mann, Charlie Byrd, and Stan Getz, who invited Gilberto and Jobim to collaborate on what became one of the best-selling jazz albums of all time, Getz/Gilberto. Through this album, Gilberto's wife, Astrud, became an international star, and the Jobim/de Moraes composition "The Girl from Ipanema" became a worldwide pop music standard for the ages. João Gilberto continued to perform through the 1960s, but did not release another studio album until João Gilberto en México, recorded in 1970 during a period of residence in Mexico. João Gilberto, aka the "White Album" (1973), featured hypnotic minimalist execution and is widely considered to be his best album. The year 1976 saw the release of The Best of Two Worlds, a reunion with Stan Getz, featuring singer Miúcha, sister of Chico Buarque, who had become Gilberto's second wife in April 1965. Amoroso (1977) backed Gilberto with the lush string orchestration of Claus Ogerman, who had provided a similar sound to Jobim's instrumental recordings in the late 1960s and early 1970s. As had been the case for all of Gilberto's albums, the album consisted mostly of Jobim compositions, mixed with older sambas and an occasional North American standard from the 1940s. Having lived in the US since 1962, João Gilberto returned to Brazil in 1980. The following year saw the release of Brasil, with guests Gilberto Gil and Caetano Veloso, who in the late 1960s had founded the tropicalia movement, a fusion of Brazilian popular music with foreign pop. The 1991 release, João, with orchestrations by Clare Fischer, was unusual in its lack of even a single Jobim composition, instead featuring songs in English, French, Italian, and Spanish, plus old sambas and the solitary contemporary song "Sampa" (Caetano Veloso). Also released in 1991 was the album Canto Do Pajé by Veloso's sister Maria Bethânia on which Bethânia and Gilberto sing an intimate duet Maria/Linda Flor (Barroso, Peixoto, Vogler, Costa, and Pôrto) accompanied solely by his guitar. João Voz e Violão (2000) was an homage to the music of Gilberto's youth as well as a nod to producer Caetano Veloso. Evenly interspersed with these studio recordings have been the live recordings, Live in Montreux; João Gilberto Prado Pereira de Oliveira; Eu Sei Que Vou Te Amar; Live at Umbria Jazz; and Live in Tokyo. While all of Gilberto's albums since Getz/Gilberto have been released on CD, the first three domestic albums were released in 1988 by EMI on a single CD entitled The Legendary João Gilberto: The Original Bossa Nova Recordings (1958-1961). The disc also included three tracks from the singer's 1959 Orfeu Negro EP: "Manhã de Carnaval," O Nosso Amor, and A Felicidade, the latter two merged into a single medley track to fit within the recording time of a CD. After its release, Gilberto successfully sued to have the title removed from sale as an unauthorized release of his artistic works. João Gilberto has long had a reputation as an eccentric recluse and a nearly neurotic perfectionist. He lives in an apartment in Leblon, Rio de Janeiro, refusing all interviews and avoiding crowds. He has been known to walk out on performances in response to an audience he considers disrespectful or out of theaters possessing acoustics below his standards, and at times demands that the air conditioning be turned off at concert venues. Yet he continues to perform to sell-out crowds in Brazil as well as in Europe, North America, and Japan. last.fm Pictures of Joao Gilberto [+] Astrud Gilberto [+] Stan Getz [+] Antonio Carlos JobimShow more imagesMore: Joao Gilberto [+] Astrud Gilberto [+] Stan Getz [+] Antonio Carlos Jobim Lyrics for The girl from Ipanema / Garota de Ipanema by Joao Gilberto [+] Astrud Gilberto [+] Stan Getz [+] Antonio Carlos Jobim: Olha que coisa mais linda mais cheia de graça É ela menina que vem e que passa nun doce balanço, caminho do mar... Moça do corpo dourado, do sol de Ipanema O seu balançado é mais que un poema é a coisa mais linda que eu já vi passar... Ah! Porque estou tão sozinho Ah! Porque tudo é tão triste Ah! A beleza que existe A beleza que não é só minha que também passa sozinha Ah! Se ela soubesse que quando ela passa o mundo sorrindo se enche de graça e fica mais lindo por causa do amor Tall and tan and young and lovely The girl from Ipanema goes walking And when she passes, each one she passes goes - ah When she walks, she's like a samba That swings so cool and sways so gentle That when she passes, each one she passes goes - ooh (Ooh) But he watches her so sadly How can he tell her he loves her Yes he would give his heart gladly But each day, when she walks to the sea She looks straight ahead, not at he Tall, (and) tan, (and) young, (and) lovely The girl from Ipanema goes walking And when she passes, he smiled - but she doesn't see (Ooh) But he watches her so sadly How can he tell her he loves her Yes he would give his heart gladly But each day, when she walks to the sea She looks straight ahead, not at he Tall, (and) tan, (and) young, (and) lovely The girl from Ipanema goes walking And when she passes, he smiled - but she doesn't see (She just doesn't see, she never sees he,...) (She just doesn't see, she never sees he,...)Music video with Joao Gilberto [+] Astrud Gilberto [+] Stan Getz [+] Antonio Carlos JobimHere you can find videos from Youtube with Joao Gilberto [+] Astrud Gilberto [+] Stan Getz [+] Antonio Carlos Jobim - The girl from Ipanema / Garota de IpanemaOriginally from the 1964 verve album "Getz/Gilberto" featuring Antonio Carlos Jobim & Astrud Gilberto. Stanley Gayetzky or Stanley Gayetsky (born February 2, 1927 June 6, 1991), usually known by his stage name Stan Getz, was an American jazz saxophone player. Getz was known as "The Sound" because of his warm, lyrical tone, his prime influence being the wispy, mellow tone of his idol, Lester Young João Gilberto (born João Gilberto Prado Pereira de Oliveira on June 10, 1931 in Juazeiro, Bahia) is a Grammy Award-winning Brazilian singer and guitarist. He is credited with having created the bossa nova beat and is known as the "Father of Bossa Nova." His seminal recordings, including many songs by Antonio Carlos Jobim and Vinicius de Moraes, established the new musical genre in the late 1950s. Astrud Gilberto (born March 29, 1940) is a Brazilian singer best known for her samba and bossa nova music, most famously as the vocalist on the Grammy Award-winning song "The Girl from Ipanema". Astrud Gilberto was born as Astrud Weinert, the daughter of a Brazilian mother and a German father, in the state of Bahia, Brazil, and was raised in Rio de Janeiro. In 1959, she married João Gilberto, later emigrating to the United States in 1963. They eventually divorced in the mid-1960s. She sang on the influential album Getz/Gilberto featuring João Gilberto, Stan Getz, and Antonio Carlos Jobim. She had never performed professionally, and sang on the recordings at the suggestion of her (then ...

post.title: What's Up With Apple?
post.summary:
So what's going on with Apple lately? There has been a lot of talk that they have not quite met expectations this year, and the stock is a good deal lower than it's highest point of over 700 buckaroos. It's about 450 last time I checked. Statistical Analysts and other tie-wearing people who spend their days thinking about what a company's value is are saying that the stock's performance is stellar for pretty much any company.
But Apple isn't just any company. They're the biggest tech company in the world, and when the stock is a little higher it's the biggest company in the world, period. Coming from near bankruptcy about the time Steve Jobs returned, Apple has really kicked some serious ass. They are now being treated like a junk stock because they didn't meet the expectations the analysts have set for them. However what they did do is sell more iPhones and iPads and Macs than they ever have before. Because they are in direct competition with both traditional computer companies and mobile computer companies they have to be better at everything. And tech being what it is, there will always be those who prefer the other brand, if only because it's the other brand.
The thing is, Apple created not only modern computing as we know it, but also the entire market for which they are now being accused of failing to hold onto enough of a share of. And they're selling like crazy. People expect there to be more and more and even more with companies like Apple, and when a company is this big, the analysts expect what I think are unreasonable numbers. I mean, let's face it, many of us own multiple Apple products. Speaking for myself, in our home of 2 adults we have an iMac, a Mac Book Pro, an iPad 2, iPad 3 and two iPhone 5 smartphones. Oh and an iPad mini. We also had the original iPad but I passed it along to my Mom this past Christmas. I just don't need any more Apple stuff till it's time for the next iPhone.
And that's just the problem with the analysts and their numbers and their unreasonable expectations. Apple has always outshone the predicted numbers, but there does come a time when everyone has all the Apple gear they'll need for awhile. They've saturated the market with iOS devices and people simply already have what they need.
Should you hold onto your stock or dump it? That's completely up to you. I'm holding onto the few shares I own. If you bought a year or so ago or earlier and got in at under 450 you're still ahead of the game. Think about when Apple stock was 20 bucks and people dumped it figuring they'd cut their losses. If they'd held onto that stock back in the 90s or early this century they'd be gazillionaires by now. Also Apple has gone back to paying dividends, so your money is growing even if the price remains lower than it's highest. I think it's gonna go over a thousand bucks a share within 5 years, but that's my opinion as a layperson.
Has Apple become stagnant with the demise of Steve Jobs? Hell to the no. I think that the perception is just that. But the reality is much more evident. Steve Jobs was one person who made decisions. He didn't actually design anything. He didn't build anything. He made decisions about which way to go on things, and he had a huge amount of influence. I'm not denigrating him at all. Just saying, he's one guy. And he left the company in the hands of people he trusted. People whom have been designing and building and producing and improving and selling Apple products for their entire careers, many of them.
Apple isn't going anywhere. They've only recently begun selling in China, one of the biggest markets on the planet. And there is a multi million dollar industry on planet Earth of Apple knock offs. There are so many people who want an iPhone or iPad that people are willing to buy a fake one if they can't afford the real deal, or it's not for sale in their country.
What will Apple do to grow market share? Here's the thing. Apple already has saturated every market they're in, and they're very very successful. They don't need to sell more iPhones to make some seat warmer in an office on Wall Street fell secure that the stock will go up. It will go up simply because they're doing what they do better than any other company that competes with them does it. Apple doesn't try to give you the most features quicker than anybody else. They never have and never will. What Apple does is ensure that the features included in their products are the best out there. Yes, Maps had a stutter or two along the way. But despite a few minor issues, it is much more user friendly and well thought out than any other gps app that came before it.
What Apple really needs to do it increase market share is to create entirely new markets or to invade markets new to them, such as television, set top box, cable and mobile wireless internet. And with the billions upon billions of dollars in CASH that Apple has sitting around they can jump into any market they choose. Hell, Apple could take a pittance (to them, of course), and start making cars. But if they did, that car would be driverless and most likely the most futuristic, cool ass, technologically advanced vehicle ever made. I don't think they're getting into Detroit though.
What I think Apple may do is one of the suggestions listed above. Probably something with TV or cable or subscription services for the television. Perhaps an all in one projector or super thin flat screen tv with a hybrid cable-like streaming service that offers all of the traditional channels along with all of the benefits of both. I think that a projector would be the best way to go, and having a laser pico for travel along with a larger high def high lumens version for the home would be great. If Apple can work out a deal with the content providers or purchase all of the companies involved first if necessary they would be able to virtually overnight take over the whole cable industry.
What I'd like to see them do, as opposed to what I think they'll do, is to start up their own wireless 4G or even 5G national and eventually global network. The biggest chink in the armor of Apple's revered iPhone is the wireless carriers. They have clamored for the iPhone only to make false claims of congested networks in order to move as many people as possible from unlimited data to tiered data plans. They've limited unlimited plans in a way that is unlawful and which cripples the iPhone's built in functionality. They block Facetime over the few gigs of 4G data they allow the few remaining "unlimited" customers to use, further crippling the iPhone. The block tethering on iOS devices, again crippling the iOS devices' intended use.
An iPhone which can do everything which is limited by the carriers now, even with no substantial operating system improvements, would considerably improve the experience one has with it. Imagine never worrying about data fees or being able to tether or going out of network or video calling home while on the train or walking out the door of your office building. All that is what the iPhone can do, should do, actually does, except that your carrier limits that functionality. If Apple created their own network or purchased some of the carriers outright, they would control the entire iPhone ecosystem as it relates to internet and voice. They would of course want to offer a plan which is affordable, unlimited and allows tethering. So when you are out in the middle of Buttfuck Tennessee on a business trip and need to, oh I dunno, let's say buy a few new books on your kindle, you won't have to seek out the desk clerk at the crappy hotel your company put you up in to request the password for the wifi. You'll just connect your kindle to your iPhone or iPad's data connection and off you go. And that ridiculous violation of net neutrality laws which the carriers force us to suffer through will end. Yes, ladies and gentlemen, we will be able to use Facetime over 4G!
So yeah, Apple is just fine. But if they do grow by creating or jumping into new markets, they'll be even cooler. And hopefully they'll do the wireless carrier thing AND the cable/tv/streaming video thing. Because think about what you're spending right now, thins month, just for cable and cellular. Including your internet on both and your voice plan on both. Two of us with Uverse and AT&T with mid range speed internet (another rip off, cable internet is supposed to be super fast, not metered, as it once was) are spending damn near 400 bucks a month. That's with all the pay channels on Uverse, unlimited internet which is actually limited to 5 gigs on 4G, 450 voice minutes and unlimited texting between 2 iPhones and 3 Uverse boxes. Imagine that you were paying Apple that money instead. It would probably be about half what we're paying now and we'd be getting unlimited everything.
See, Apple realizes, as Spotify and Netflix does, that a person can only watch so much at a time, only use so much internet at a time, etc. Let's pray that Apple does save us from the corporate hell the cable and wireless service providers put us through. In the meantime, hold onto your Apple stock and thank me with some of it when your shares go over a thousand. Cuz I truly believe it will. And I'll regret not owning more than a few shares when it does. And please Mr. Analyst guy who says that Apple sucks because they didn't hit the unrealistic marks you set for them, calm down a bit and realize what a great company it is.

post.title: en ny blogg har ankommet verden
post.summary: Velkommen til min blogg! Jeg kan desverre ikke si hva jeg heter eller hvor gammel jeg er, men jeg er rundt 12-17 årene. På denne bloggen skal jeg dele mine minner. Feks: reiser, helger... og litt sånn hvis du skjønner. Jeg bor på sørlandet, ved kysten av Norge. Og det står kanskje det på info om meg om hvilken by jeg bor i. Altså Arendal. Jeg har en familie på 5 og til sammen er vi 6. Har veldig mange venner som støtter meg og er der når det trengs. Love U Guys! Mitt liv handler om skole, familie og selvfølgelig... "fashion"! Elsker mote, men mer fotografering og sånt. Men jeg skal bruke mobilen min da, fordi pc'en er helt ødelagt og man kan ikke legge ut bilder på den.. Men akkurat nå bruker jeg pc'en, for bare et enkelt innlegg. Hva slags mobil har du? Jeg har iPhone 4, men ikke 4s. Jeg fikk den til jul av mamma og pappa, og er kjeeeempe glad for den! Søstra mi fikk også den, samme hvite farge og ikke 4s. Mens broren min, han har iPhone 5. Jeg synes han egentlig er veldig heldig, men jeg er fornøyd med min. Hva slags blogger leser du? Jeg leser: ♥ ssbk.blogg.no (HER) ♥ sophieelise.blogg.no (HER) ♥ maddepadde.blogg.no (HER) ♥ camille.blogg.no (HER) Hvis du har noen tips til blogger jeg burde lese, så bare skriv i kommentar feltet. Hva slags musikk hører du på? Jeg hører på ganske mye forskjellig. Feks: Coldplay, The Fray, Lana Del Rey, Rihanna, 1D, Justin Bieber, Nicki Minaj og masse mer! Er veldig glad i musikk! Og jeg har musikk fra Spotify, iTunes og iPhonen min. Hvilken sang er du veldig glad i akkuratt nå? Jeg er glad i Born To Die - Lana Del Rey, Kiss You - 1D (One Direction), Radioactive - Imagine Dragons, Diamonds - Rihanna og One Day / Reckoning Song - Asaf Avidan & the Mojos. Håper du plis, plis, plis vil tipse om bloggen min til andre, og følge meg på We♥It (HER) Enjoyyy!♥

post.title: Min allra första singel till Tille och EB-fonden.
post.summary: Alla som kommenterat sen jag gick ut med hur bloggen kommer bli framöver har varit positiva och velat höra mer av min musik. Så om ni är lite sugna på musik från Gervidskan så kan ni hitta mig både på Spotify och Itunes. Nu gör jag OHÄMMAT reklam för mig själv! Gud så anti-jante av mig!! Den enda låten som finns ute just nu är “Better Place(Tille’s song)” som var ledmotivet till dokumentären Tilles resa som gick på TV4. Den representerar inte riktigt mig som låtskrivare eftersom den skrevs till ett tydligt tema men här har ni mig: Spotify——-> Camilla – Better Place (Tille’s song) Itunes——–>Klicka här för Itunes Här är trailern för Tille’s resa. Jag vet inte om den finns att se nånstans. Jag har den på DVD men får inte lägga upp den hur som helst så klart.

post.title: 1/24: Wax Tailor @Bluebird, $15.75
post.summary: I didn’t take notes at this show because I just wanted to enjoy. And, I’m glad I did. I went in with no expectations as I’m just a Spotify fan of WaxT. So well done. Tres bon! His set synced perfectly with the visual. The guest rapper and guest vox were impressive, to say the least. I can’t give thanks to Bluebird for making sure the visual matched, because he brought his own projector. This is naive to say, but I’ll say it anyway, that Amon Tobin should check him out and see what he does to sync things correctly – but then again, the projection is on a much different scale. It has to be noted – price of ticket $15.75, price of fees $7.50. AXS, this is unacceptable! I found out from the guards at the door that they were charging differently at the box office upon entry. I wanted to secure my ticket, but shame on AXS. Ugh! Very amped I went to this. Refreshed my francophilia. Made me want to start up a long awaiting solo project – drum and bass, with me playing sax and flute too. Waiting on Sean perhaps…

post.title: Django Unchained
post.summary: For dere som ikke vet hvem Quentin Tarantino er, forteller jeg dere bare med en gang at dere bør gjøre dere kjent med han med en eneste gang! Han er virkelig en av de beste filmlagerne som jobber i dag, og det er mer enn nok å være fan av. Han skriver sine egne filmer, og regisserer de fleste av dem også. Han har kanskje ikke laget så utrolig mange filmer, men de han har laget er av utrolig god kvalitet, og "Django Unchained" er inget unntak! Jamie Foxx spiller selveste Django ( The 'd' is silent) og brilierer som eks-slave, med en fremtid som dusørjeger. Når Dr. Shultz kjøper Django og ber ham om å hjelpe ham med å drepe ettersøkte menn for en god del penger, blir hverdagen til Django endret drastisk. Det han ønsker seg mest her i livet er å finne kona si igjen. Som slaver ble de solgt hver for seg når de forrige eierene deres oppdaget at de var gift, så nå vil han finne henne igjen. Når han oppdager at hun er solgt til en av de mest beryktede slave- og plantasjeeierene, Calvin Candie ( Leonardo Dicaprio), får han hjelp fra sin nye venn Dr. Shultz med å få henne tilbake! Filmen inneholder selvsagt alt det vi kjenner som Tarantino-style, du får rett og slett en hel del bloodspatter, hvis du liker den typen ting ;) en annen ting jeg la merke til var det fanatstike soundtracket. Musikken bare rulte denne filmen, og for dere som har spotify finnes det en super spilleliste med alle sangene fra filmen der :) Filmen er virkelig verdt en titt!

post.title: Björk: Volta (2007)
post.summary: (Atlantic) RECOMMENDED Considerably better than I remembered it being, this is undoubtedly Björk-lite -- but whereas I used to define that as meaning that it was less stridently individualistic than her other work, I now regard it as being perhaps her most out-and-out "fun" record. Though I'd fallen casually hard for Selmasongs and Medulla in previous years, it was during the promotion and touring cycle for Volta that I became a devoted fan, resulting perhaps in my sentimental attachment to its warped, colorful grooves. Really, its best function is as a collection of agreeable Björk ideas and concepts that just don't necessarily form a coherent whole -- drop most of its songs somewhere in the middle of Vespertine and you won't notice a severe dip in quality. You will, however, notice that the ever-restless auteur has discovered and wrapped herself around industrial dance music, the influence of which is the real story here despite Timbaland's far-and-wide ballyhooed involvement. There's a lot of this on the two keynote protest songs -- I guess they're protest songs, I dunno: "Earth Intruders" and "Declare Independence" amount to a kind of defiant nonconformity that's sort of quaint in its simplicity, at least by this artist's standards. It's like she read some Embrace Your Quirk self-help manual. You barely need to hear either song to know where they're headed; the titles say everything. "Intruders," the opener, is anthemic cartoon-army march; "Independence" toys with international affairs in 3D world. It's as direct as Björk's ever been, to the point that she got in hilarious hot water for singing it with political-hotbed dedications around the world, but its giddy pretensions to revolution are hard to look upon as dangerous. "Don't let them do that to you," she chants like she's on a PSA, and six years have failed to dull the ability of the "make your own flag" refrain to make me chuckle. Then again, there is menace and chaos here -- it just feels a little safe. Not so for the best of the industrial-infected cuts, "Wanderlust," a truly blown-out production mixed awkwardly and brilliantly with a sweet, soaring melody. The most sinister of these songs, though, is also the most plodding -- the Radiohead ("National Anthem")-like Satanic funeral march of "Vertebrae by Vertebrae," to which the stark and rainy "Pneumonia" seems a mere coda. That song-to-song relationship is striking, the sense of prelude and resolution, because Volta as a whole seems so curiously haphazard in terms of design and sequence. Each track seems its own world unto itself with little sense of contrast and larger rhythm working outward. Maybe that's why these songs seem better on your Björk Spotify playlist than they do when heard end-to-end. We'd better talk about Timbaland, though, and I do love Timbaland; in the vein of his gloriously busy configurations with Missy Elliott, the joyous industrial-pop piece "Innocence" has genuine hooks and a dancefloor abrasiveness that sound like all the best things that "Björk collaborating with Timbaland" might suggest in your imagination. For all his name involvement and all the pop appeal of the song itself, its grit and dirtiness are to be praised; her voice cracks and the arrangement hurls itself out in a fit of the anti-slick. Not that you can tell, but the lyrics are more from the motivational section: "Fear is a powerful drug / Overcome it and you can do anything!" The non-Timbaland arrangements are, oddly enough, typically riskier and less obvious. Though it's easily argued that African and Asian music had already long been in Björk's orbit and lexicon, Volta does make some advancements here, particularly on the percussive and sensual "Hope" and the frayed lullaby "I See Who You Are." Yet on the whole, the weirdly sunny optimism on these songs is far more a consequence of the ever-growing nuance of Björk's vocals, which are better than ever before here (and would improve yet more on the otherwise merely pleasant Biophilia). Her interaction with the brass -- oh, that's the other thing about Volta: horns, lots and lots of horns -- on "Wanderlust" is nearly as endearing as the double-tracking that renders her joy that much more audible in her performance. And her duet with Antony Hegarty "The Dull Flame of Desire" may have nothing on "I've Seen It All," but it's maybe the most fascinatingly oddball Björk moment of the last decade. This is Hallmark crooning, an artifact of the purest saccharine branches of baroque pop, delivered with almost militaristic precision and sincerity. What? It's a mark of Volta's MO, I suppose (and Björk's career in general), that its strangest and most surprising moment is the one that'd seem most conventional in any other context. But in sum -- you know who you are and whether you need this. [SEE ALSO:] Selmasongs (2000) Biophilia (2011)

post.title: Lördagen som försvann
post.summary: I går kväll var vi bjudna på middag hos min kusin E med sambo. Fantastiskt gott och trevligt. De bor i det gulligaste lilla huset i skogen utanför Gävle. De spelade en underbar gammal live-CD med Winnerbäck, som jag måste kolla om jag hittar på Spotify. Då jag ändå brutit mitt köpstopp håvade jag hem en t-shirt för 99:- som hängde på en snurra utanför Kapp-Ahl. I mitt 10-pack minilack från OPI fanns nagellacket som matchade perfekt till det vinröda på tröjan. :) Träning: 1,4 mil längdåkning i Näsboda.

post.title: TRÄNINGSTIPS
post.summary:
- Om du tycker det är tråkigt att alltid gå ut och springa eller köra styrka hemma (som jag tycker), så kan man alltid skaffa ett tränings kort på t.ex sats eller friskis för att göra träningen roligare.
- Det är inte heller så kul att träna själv, så börja träna med en kompis. Det blir mycket roligare att träna med någon. Då kan man också peppa varandra.
- Gör en spelista på spotify som du kan lyssna på när du tränar. Jag brukar bli mer peppad av musiken.
- Skriv ett tränings schema. Då blir det som ett måste att du ska träna den dagen.
Det här mina tips till er. Haha, själv är jag inte den människan som brukar träna varje dag, men dom sakerna brukar hjälpa mig. Nu taggar vi sommaren 2013 :D

post.title: Nokia Music se estrena con servicio premium low cost
post.summary:
Para los que todavía no lo sepan, hoy tenemos una gran noticia que darles. Y no es otra que la finlandesa Nokia se acaba de lanzar de forma oficial, y ahora si ya parece que sí definitiva a un servicio de streaming en la nube. Y claro, estarán ustedes diciendo que de esos tenemos a punta y pala. Entonces ¿por qué elegir Nokia Music? Eso es lo que vamos a ver justo a continuación pero desde ya les adelanto que la opción precio va a estar muy presente
Más que un verdadero lanzamiento, Nokia Music+ es en realidad un re-lanzamiento. la opción ya existía pero la compañía le ha dado un importante re-diseño, la ha hecho más accesible para sus nuevos terminales y sobre todo lo ha colocado todo a un precio muy interesante, porque el servicio musical de streaming en la versión pro de la Nokia Music + es de nada menos que 3,99 dólares. Si lo comparamos con el grande entre los grandes, Spotify, las diferencias son bastante evidentes, porque como mínimo, esta empresa nos cobra de forma mensual 4,99$, que pueden llegar a convertirse en hasta 9,99$. ¿Muy caro comparado con lo que nos ofrecen en Nokia, o no? Si tenemos en cuenta que la versión gratuita de Nokia Music, que es para terminales Lumia de forma exclusiva, te permite la descarga de hasta 4 horas de música y luego la escucha ilimitada de esta en tu terminal de forma online, y que con la suscripción de pago hacen que este límite desaparezca, con lo que hay una disponibilidad prácticamente total. ¿Aún no lo conoces? Pues si tienes un Lumia, deberías echar un vistazo.

post.title: New Deep (Thoughts)
post.summary: I’m feeling deep and introspective tonight, guys. You’ve been warned. It’s most likely because I’m on this weird music kick of John Mayer and Old School Rap. Odd combo, right? I think that explains my overly introverted thoughts lately. What is not over-the-top is how perfect John’s “Love Song for No One” is for my life right now. Ever since valentine’s day everything hit the shelves (and okay, before that when I celebrated the new year kiss from my dog) I’ve been feeling extra single. The lyric “I’m tired of being alone, so hurry up and get here” seems particularly perfect as I am very tied of being alone, and would very much appreciate someone showing up already. Along this kick of musical oddity, I’ve spent some time reliving the ninety’s. I would HIGHLY recommend this. Last night I spent an hour jamming out to N*Sync, Backstreet Boys, Spice Girls. It was bomb. SO fab. But prepare yourselves beforehand, because when you spotify N* Sync, the first thing that pops up is a greatest hits album… uh, excuse me, when did this happen? This is not okay. I feel old. A quick Wiki search just told me Justin Timberlake is 31, which is clearly wrong because in my mind he is still like 23. This is why in my mind I also have a shot at him being the guy I’m singing “Love Song for No One” to, but Biel probs sealed the coffin on that. But honestly, I think he snuck onto the set of Tuck Everlasting (throwback) and drank some of that water, because he hasn’t aged a day since the day after he got rid of his top ramen bleached hair and entered adulthood. Also I expect him to age as gracefully as George Clooney if he ever does actually age. Another weird musical genre I’m into right now (and lets face it, always) is British Rap. There is something about a Brit who spits out rhymes faster than I can comprehend them that is so classy to me. They take everything that is so ghetto about American rap, and make it all awesome and british. Rizzle Kicks is my current favorite. I also don’t mind when Ed Sheeran does that fast talking singing thing he does so well. Finally I feel as though I should mention that even after nearly two months, I am still in love with Ke$ha’s new album. Warrior is my jam. And not Warrior as in the title song of the album- but totally as the whole album, because the whole thing is freaking amazing and she sings for real and I just gain all this respect for her hard-knock lifestyle pre-success when I listen to Wonderland. Wonderland = What dreams are made of. Any who… That’s my weird introspective music kick. I’m over thinking lyrics, listening to my favorite throwback jams, and spending this fantastic Saturday evening hanging out with John Mayer and J.T. Might meet up with Jenny from the Block later. ad finem

post.title: La mejor música para el acto sexual
post.summary: Al Psicólogo especialista en realizar estudios sobre música, Daniel Mulllensiefen, le fue encargada la tarea, por Spotify, de analizar cuáles eran las canciones preferidas de mujeres y hombres para el acto sexual. Estableciendo una relación entre la música, el amor y la seducción. “Las personas usan la música no solo para comunicar sus intenciones en situaciones románticas, sino también para modificar su estado de ánimo durante el encuentro” El estudio “Science Behind the Song” fue realizado en Reino Unido, con una muestra de 2000 sujetos, con edades que oscilaban entre 18 y 91 años, manteniendo una división de género similar. De esta muestra se extrajeron las 20 mejores canciones, consideradas como las más adecuadas para escuchar durante todo el proceso del acto sexual. Se concluyó también que los hombres cambian de hábitos y gustos musicales, con mayor probabilidad que las mujeres. El doctor Müllensiefen explicó: “No es sorpresa que tantos encuestados afirmaran que la música les estimulaba en el dormitorio. Gracias a la investigación neurocientífica, sabemos que la música es capaz de activar las mismas zonas de placer del cerebro que también responden a recompensas mucho menos abstractas como la comida, o el sexo”. Este es el top 20 de las canciones más utilizadas para escuchar en el acto sexual: 1. Dirty Dancing- Anything from the soundtrack2. Marvin Gaye- Sexual Healing 3. Ravel – Bolero 4. Berlin- Take My Breath Away 5. Barry White- Anything from his collection 6. Marvin Gaye- Let’s Get It On 7. Righteous Brothers- Unchained Melody 8. Celine Dion- Titanic Soundtrack / My Heart Will Go On 9. Serge Gainsbourg- Je T`aime 10. Whitney Houston- I Will Always Love you 11. Aerosmith- Don`t Want To Miss A Thing 12. Kings Of Leon- Sex On Fire 13. Rodgers & Hammerstein- Sound of Music 14. Tchaikovsky – 1812 Overture 15. Grease- Grease soundtrack 16. Donna Summer- I Feel Love 17. Boys To Men- I’ll Make Love To You 18. ABBA- Mama Mia 19. Tom Jones – Sex Bomb 20. Star Wars -Anything form the soundtrack Son todas únicas y muchas se pueden considerar como ‘obras maestras’ épicas. Cuando escuchamos música, construimos una expectativa de cómo va a seguir la música. Si supera nuestras expectativas musicales y va por un camino diferente nuestra respuesta emocional involuntaria es altamente positiva y principalmente son estos puntos de cambio inesperados en la música los que generan fuertes sensaciones emocionales”. Tras este estudio ya sólo queda comprobarlo por cuenta propia, seguro que cada cual tiene unos gustos diferentes en cuanto a la música que le gusta escuchar para el encuentro sexual, e incluso variando a cómo sea la situación entre la pareja, un encuentro más relajante, o más pasional. La música es capaz de potenciar el estado que convenga en el momento adecuado para establecer un perfecto ambiente sexual. Aqui algunas recomendadas / ver videos .

<a Drona pada 26 Januari 2013 6:00 KINERJA SAHAM MINGGUAN Sektor media sosial dilakukan dengan baik pekan ini dengan kenaikan mingguan rata-rata 2% sebagai Q4/12 GOOG ini pendapatan perusahaan melaju sampai 7%, menunjukkan peningkatan marjinal BPK, yang telah berada di bawah tekanan pada tahun lalu karena terus pengguna pergeseran dari desktop ke ponsel (lihat Commentary). Saham Pandora juga rebound kuat, meskipun hal ini tidak didasarkan pada berita fundamental, melainkan kemungkinan spekulasi kinerja iklan seluler ditingkatkan flimsily berdasarkan hasil GOOG itu. Mengesankan, sektor media sosial mampu bersinar meskipun sentimen investor negatif di sekitar laba AAPL ini (turun 12% pada minggu). Untuk tahun kalender 2013, pengembalian rata-rata untuk sektor media sosial adalah keuntungan dari 8%. Meskipun tidak dalam indeks sosial kita, NFLX memiliki lompatan yang luar biasa dari 71% minggu ini didasarkan pada profitabilitas meningkat dan penambahan pelanggan baik di depan expecations konsensus. Minggu depan kita akan melihat pendapatan terkenal dari YHOO dan AMZN, meskipun semua mata akan berada di FB (lihat Commentary).
Ganti SEJAK 18 Januari
Ganti SEJAK 18 Januari
P GOOG GRPN FB CENGKING LNKD jive YHOO
9,3% 7,0% 6,5% 6,3% 4,3% 4,0% 1,8% 1,7%
Sina ZNGA RENN Angi OPEN MM BIDU WebM
1,7% 1,6% 0,9% 0,5% (0,7%) (1,0%) (1,7%) (5,9%)
KOMENTAR LABA SEASON
GOOG mengumumkan Q4/12 pendapatan mereka untuk penerimaan positif dengan pendapatan kotor standalone (tidak termasuk unit rumah Motorola bisnis dihentikan) dari $ 12.91bn (tahun meningkat 21% -over-tahun yang mewakili percepatan vs 17% pada kuartal sebelumnya) mengalahkan angka konsensus $ 12.73bn. Pada basis non-GAAP EPS, Google melaporkan $ 10,65, mengalahkan konsensus $ 10,61 (meskipun ini termasuk kerugian dari segmen Motorola dihentikan). GOOG yang Cost-Per-Klik (BPK) naik 2% q / q, tapi turun 6% tahun-ke tahun, yang lebih baik dari ekspektasi Wall Street, yang kemungkinan merupakan faktor utama dalam reaksi positif pasar terhadap laporan laba. Kami mempertahankan bahwa membalikkan tekanan ke bawah pada harga iklan selama pergeseran terus ke ponsel adalah faktor kunci untuk pertumbuhan potensi saham GOOG pada tahun 2013, meskipun Biaya Akuisisi Lalu Lintas (TAC) tetap menjadi perhatian dan sedikit lebih tinggi pada ay / y dasar. Perusahaan mencatat bahwa kebijakan perubahan untuk meningkatkan pengalaman pengguna dengan produk iklan seperti membatasi jumlah iklan per halaman, yang penting dalam meningkatkan BPK, dan GOOG mengharapkan untuk melihat dampak-dampak positif berlanjut dalam beberapa kuartal ke depan. NFLX melaporkan hasil yang kuat di Q4/12 nya keuangan, dengan pendapatan sebesar $ 945mn (vs konsensus $ 935mn) dan EPS disesuaikan sebesar $ 0,29, jauh di atas konsensus sebesar $ 0,09. Biaya isi lebih rendah dan peningkatan pelanggan domestik dan internasional melaju profitabilitas dan membantu reposisi saham dalam komunitas investor mengakibatkan keuntungan satu minggu mengejutkan 71%. Pedoman untuk pelanggan domestik mengalir Q1/13 adalah titik tengah dari 1.75mn, baik di depan konsensus di 1.2mn. Facebook
Dengan fokus pada pendapatan FB minggu depan, investor harus mengambil pelajaran dari AAPL dan perhatikan bahwa hasil perusahaan peduli kurang dari bagaimana hasil tersebut dibandingkan dengan harapan. Dengan FB, kami terus mengingatkan investor bahwa tidak ada bukti yang menunjukkan jual-sisi “channel cek” input telah sangat berkorelasi dengan angka keuangan FB di masa lalu. Masukan ini tidak dapat diandalkan sebagai studi pihak ketiga iklan yang terlalu kecil dan kadang-kadang anekdot di alam. Namun, kami mengakui bahwa peningkatan Q4 GOOG di BPK nampaknya mengindikasikan bahwa harga iklan mobile dapat mencapai titik kritis yang positif di masa depan, dan isu utama untuk FB di tahun lalu telah menjadi kanibalisasi dari pendapatan iklan desktop karena pengguna pergeseran ke ponsel . Menuju ke kuartal, konsensus pendapatan untuk Q4/12 tetap pada $ 1.52bn, yang merupakan perkiraan percepatan ulang pada basis tahun-ke tahun (35% di Q4/12 vs 32% pada Q3/12)., dan menunjukkan pertumbuhan kuartal-over-kuartal 21% vs kenaikan 7% pada Q3/12. Meskipun sulit untuk meramalkan pembayaran dan kinerja biaya, jika segmen yang akan datar di Q4, Q4/12 pendapatan iklan FB akan perlu tumbuh 24% q / q (yang merupakan sesuatu yang FB belum dicapai dalam delapan kuartal) untuk memenuhi harapan. Dalam rangka untuk memberikan kenyamanan bagi angka-angka ini, bulls FB harus mencari Hadiah untuk meningkatkan pembayaran dan segmen biaya, dan jalan iklan News Feed, (Cerita Sponsor, Pos Dipromosikan, dan Install App iklan). Secara khusus, jumlah yang kita rasakan akan memiliki dampak terbesar pada sentimen investor akan menjadi komponen mobile ads News Feed, saat ini dimodelkan pada $ 354mn dengan konsensus. Jika iklan Berita seluler Pakan signifikan mengalahkan perkiraan bahwa (mungkin di atas $ 400mn), mendorong pendapatan Sponsor jumlah Cerita mendekati US $ 500mn, ini dapat meningkatkan saham ke dan sedikit di atas tingkat harga IPO sebesar $ 38 per saham, meskipun investor konservatif harus tetap diingat bahwa saham FB yang up 59% dalam dua bulan sejak berakhirnya lock-up perusahaan pada 14 November. Terakhir, kami percaya bahwa keterlibatan pengguna akan menjadi indikator yang sangat penting bagi kinerja perusahaan sepanjang 2013 (tidak hanya dalam jangka pendek), yang telah dasarnya datar di pasar primer FB itu, Amerika Utara. Jika keterlibatan melemah, ini akan menjadi masalah serius bagi perusahaan di jalan, dan kami percaya bahwa metrik keterlibatan akan berada di bawah tekanan yang meningkat pada paruh kedua tahun 2013 khususnya . PERKEMBANGAN KUNCI DI SOSIAL & INTERNET Facebook FB diluncurkan konversi pengukurannya sistem bagi pemasar global (setelah peluncuran terbatas pada bulan November), yang mengukur dan melaporkan bila pengguna melihat iklan pada satu platform, namun mengkonversi yang lain (seperti mobile vs desktop).
AAPL Perusahaan ini mengumumkan laba yang mengecewakan investor meskipun perusahaan terus melakukan dengan baik. Masalah utama adalah bahwa analis / konsensus harapan yang tidak terpenuhi pada pendapatan, dan bimbingan AAPL untuk kuartal berikutnya juga di bawah ekspektasi ($ 41bn-$ 43bn vs $ 45.6bn konsensus).
Amazon Perusahaan diperbarui Cloud Drive nya Foto app akan memungkinkan upload otomatis ke server awan.
AMZN mengumumkan layanan In-App pembelian baru yang memungkinkan pengembang untuk membiarkan pelanggan menggunakan rekening Amazon untuk membeli barang-barang virtual dan mata uang dari dalam Mac, game PC, dan web-based.
Perusahaan mengakuisisi Ivona Software, sebuah perusahaan text-to-voice (teknologi diimplementasikan ke dalam tablet Kindle), untuk jumlah yang tidak diungkapkan.
Google Q4/12 GOOG ini pendapatan yang solid dengan pendapatan mandiri yang mengalahkan konsensus dan yang lebih penting, meningkatkan sedikit angka BPK yang mungkin menunjukkan tanda-tanda perubahan harga iklan perusahaan.
GOOG diperbarui pencarian gambar untuk menampilkan hasil foto pada panel inline untuk bergulir mudah / flipthrough, serta menunjukkan informasi metadata pada halaman hasil pencarian.
Orange, telekomunikasi internasional, mencatat bahwa GOOG membayar itu “ratusan juta” untuk mengimbangi biaya memberikan layanan GOOG untuk pelanggan mobile (terutama YouTube lalu lintas).
Dalam Laporan Transparansi, GOOG mencatat bahwa AS permintaan data pribadi meningkat sebesar 136% pada akhir tahun 2012 dari paruh kedua tahun 2009, dimana 68% dibuat di bawah Komunikasi Elektronik Privacy Act panggilan dari pengadilan (dan GOOG sesuai dengan 90% dari permintaan tersebut).
GOOG membuka kantor di Filipina untuk lebih memposisikan diri di pasar Tenggara berkembang Asia.
Groupon Dalam konteks media yang meningkat dan perhatian politik pada kontrol senjata di AS, GRPN menghentikan semua senjata yang berhubungan dengan penawaran di Amerika Utara.
NFLX NFLX melaporkan hasil yang kuat Q4/12, memukul pendapatan dan laba, dengan profitabilitas karena biaya meningkat menjadi konten yang lebih rendah dan peningkatan pelanggan domestik dan internasional yang mengakibatkan kenaikan satu minggu mengejutkan 71%. data <hr class=”c18″/> dari sebuah laporan baru dari NPD Group menunjukkan bahwa lebih dari setengah konsumen usia 18-24 yang memiliki TV yang terhubung ke Internet menonton Netflix di TV.
Serendip Serendip meluncurkan aplikasi iOS yang memungkinkan musik streaming yang kebetulan menggunakan data dari teman dikumpulkan dengan data musik dari YouTube, Vimeo, dan SoundCloud Bandcamp.
Sina Meskipun belum dikonfirmasi ​​oleh perusahaan, tampak bahwa Sina telah bermitra dengan Qihoo 360 pada platform game web, termasuk kerjasama promosi permainan, perencanaan acara, dan konten. Spotify
Spotify mengumumkan kemitraan dengan Orange yang akan menghasilkan “Orange muda,” layanan musik tak terbatas untuk pasar di bawah-27 di Swiss yang meliputi panggilan tak terbatas, teks, dan ditentukan mobile data paket, dengan harga serendah $ 20 bulan .
Lapangan Keith Rabois, COO Square, telah mengundurkan diri dari perusahaan, dan Sarah Friar, saat CFO, COO akan menjadi akting. The WSJ berspekulasi bahwa Rabois mengundurkan diri karena klaim pelecehan seksual, meskipun hal ini berdasar pada saat ini.
Tumblr Tumblr diperbarui dashboard untuk memulai tulisan dengan mempersatukan layar menjadi potongan seukuran gigitan yang membangkitkan pola pikir lebih mudah dan lebih cepat bagi pengguna.
Twitter Perusahaan ini meluncurkan Vine videonya aplikasi berbagi (Twitter mengakuisisi Vine pada bulan Oktober) yang memungkinkan pengguna untuk menembak video yang dipotong bersama-sama ke versi 6 detik untuk berbagi. Dalam berita terkait, FB diblokir Vine dari Find Friends API nya dan baru-baru ini menutup akses dari grafik sosial dari sejumlah pihak lain.
Twitter mengumumkan diperbarui untuk Tweets yang tertanam, yang sekarang akan memberikan lebih banyak konten dan konteks (teks, foto, dan ringkasan video, serta jumlah keterlibatan).
Yahoo Perusahaan mengakuisisi Snip.it, sebuah situs bookmarking Pinterest-gaya, untuk jumlah yang tidak diungkapkan (tampaknya kurang dari $ 20m). Snip.it akan menutup situs web dan akan para insinyur akan bekerja pada proyek-proyek teknologi serupa di YHOO.
Dalam sebuah wawancara, YHOO mencatat bahwa strategi keseluruhan adalah untuk memposisikan situs sebagai hub konten penemuan pribadi (termasuk Yahoo Search). Yandex
Perusahaan ini meluncurkan versi pilot Wonder, suara bertenaga pencarian aplikasi sosial yang mengintegrasikan pencarian data eksklusif dengan informasi dari jaringan sosial termasuk Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, dan Foursquare.
Sangkalan Pengguna mengakui bahwa ia / dia tidak bergantung pada isi atau informasi yang terkandung dalam laporan sebelumnya untuk setiap, keuangan pajak, akuntansi hukum,, atau masalah bisnis lainnya, dan akan bergantung pada saran dari para profesional sendiri dan penasehat untuk hal-hal semacam itu. Pengguna mengakui bahwa laporan di atas adalah untuk tujuan informatif dan / atau hiburan saja dan menyebutkan atau referensi dari perusahaan mana pun tidak berarti merupakan rekomendasi investasi. Pengguna mengakui bahwa dalam kondisi apapun adalah setiap isi dari laporan yang akan ditafsirkan sebagai penawaran, permintaan, atau rekomendasi untuk membeli, menjual, atau meminta pembelian atau penjualan sekuritas dari perusahaan yang disebutkan. Pengguna mengakui bahwa informasi yang terdapat dalam laporan ini diperoleh dari sumber yang dapat dipercaya, tapi keakuratan dan kelengkapan, dan bahwa pendapat berbasis atasnya, tidak dijamin. WebMediaBrands dan penulis tidak akan bertanggung jawab atas kerugian ekonomi yang dapat dipertahankan berdasarkan ketergantungan dari setiap materi yang dipublikasikan dalam laporan. Related Stories

post.title: Confessions of a Saturday Night Student
post.summary: 1. I refuse all help when making my bed. I am usually pretty gracious, and accept and offer help with many things but none of you people get the corners of the fitted sheet on tight enough, so help me God. 2. I downloaded Spotify because it seemed like the obvious thing to do if you're human and like music. I have no idea how to use it and I just delete every email I get from them telling me that "So-and-so has a new playlist for you!" I think I feel like I'm missing out more now that I have it and can't figure it out then I did before I ever downloaded it. 3. It makes me incredibly happy when people come over and compliment our home. It's not fancy, by any means, but it's filled with hand-picked (thrifted) things that we love and it's more gratifying than I could have ever imagined, creating a space that feels like home. 4. We call Lucy by her real name so infrequently that I'm not sure she knows it. Goose, Gooseifer (rhymes with Lucifer, and not coincidentally), and Goose-in-Round are her preferred monikers. Soon she'll stop meowing and start honking. 5. I learned several years ago that bananas are easier to peel from the bottom, like how monkeys do it. I still stubbornly peel them from the top because I don't like having the butt end be my first bite. 6. I get very, very seasick and yet managed to row for most of my college career without incident. 7. My very first email address was on Hotmail, and it involved the word "froggy" and the word "gurl." Oh yes. Yes it did. I didn't even like frogs. I'm still not sure where that one came from. 8. I think marshmallows are disgusting. The taste, the texture, the fact that they are made out of horses' hooves. And then...fluff? Marshmallow as sandwich spread? What the what? 9. I never had a set of keys until I went to college. We didn't lock our house growing up and the car keys were just that - for the car, and certainly not mine. I was more than a little bit excited about having a lanyard with an ID card and multiple keys (house, room, closet, etc.) dangling from it for at least two whole days at the start of my first year. 10. A fellow midwifery student and I were talking at close range the other day when she suddenly stopped me and said, "Did your mom nurse you?" "...Yes..." I replied, baffled as to where this was going. "You have a tongue-tie! She must have been a tough lady." I explained that I was last in a long line of other eager nursers and that my poor mother's nipples were probably sufficiently toughened by the time I came along to withstand my imperfect latch. Learn something new every day, huh?

post.title: Imagine Dragons – Radioactive
post.summary: Listen to Imagine Dragons - Radioactive (3,14 min) on spotify. Radioactive can be found on the album Continued Silence EP which were released 2012, track nr: 1About Imagine DragonsImagine Dragons are an alternative rock band which formed in 2008 in Las Vegas, Nevada, United States. The band consists of Dan Reynolds (vocals), Wayne Sermon (guitar), Ben McKee (bass) and Daniel Platzman (drums). The band released four EPs - "Imagine Dragons" (2009), "Hell and Silence" (2010), "It's Time" (2011) and "Continued Silence" (2012) - before releasing their debut full length album "Night Visions" on 4 September 2012. The band's single "It's Time", which previously appeared on the "It's Time" and "Continued Silence" EPs in addition to appearing on "Night Visions", is the group's biggest hit, reaching #33 on the Billboard Hot 100. In a dark kitchen in the middle of a sweaty night in Las Vegas, all 6'4" of Dan Reynolds is hunched over a laptop, slapping beats on the table and crooning lyrics into a tiny microphone. Before long, he and the other three members of indie rock band Imagine Dragons would be playing "It's Time," that same laptop-demo-turned-supersized-anthem, from the roof of a parking garage to a wave of thousands of screaming fans. This song title to the single from their 2012 debut KidInaKorner/Interscope release "Continued Silence EP" is an all too apt descriptor of the band's hard-earned success--but it's also emblematic of the deep-seated anxiety Reynolds and the rest of the band experienced leaving behind any realistic expectation of a normal job to do the thing they love most. A third-generation Las Vegas native, Reynolds is no stranger to the adage "the house always wins," choosing to pave his musical career with a near obsessive work ethic and hundreds of unused demos rather than roll the dice with the first songs that sprung from his mouth. It's no surprise, then, that he was drawn to guitarist Wayne Sermon, another founding member of Imagine Dragons. Having practically grown up in a recording studio and graduated Berklee College of Music, Wayne had been practicing his guitar through meals and other socially inappropriate situations as long as he could remember; he challenged Dan in a way that was both uncomfortable and exactly what they both needed. When they began writing songs together and recognized something special was happening, Wayne called up his Berklee friend Ben McKee, who promptly dropped out of school with only a few credits left, moving across the country to play bass for the band. This sort of reckless/genius behavior is typical for Ben, who has an uncanny penchant for spicy food and a suitcase full of unbelievable road stories. More recently, the band was joined by drummer Daniel Platzman, another Bostonian schoolmate who seems way too nice to be playing rock and roll until you actually see him in action. Several tours and three self-released EPs later, Imagine Dragons had made a serious name for itself, particularly in the west coast circuit. Although their songs vary from nearly whimsical and light to brooding and powerful, listeners are drawn to the inherent honesty in the music. The only rule of thumb for the band, it seems, is to write from a true place; the result is songs that literally run the spectrum of human emotion. Attend a concert, and it becomes clear that the live performance of deeply personal songs has a real effect on people. And the band itself is not immune, as demonstrated when Dan literally passed out into the drum set during a finale song, sending cymbals and drum stands crashing while the rest of the band played on until the close. Great songwriting is bound to be noticed eventually. As proof that the harder you work, the luckier you get, one of those people who noticed was Grammy winning producer Alex da Kid (Eminem, Rihanna). Alex and Dan began collaborating on projects, and soon the band had developed a relationship with Alex and his team. The alchemy resulting from Alex's hip hop sensibilities and Imagine Dragons' anthemic rock is nothing short of explosive. The byproduct of this creative collision is "Continued Silence," a six song in-your-face sonic grenade that breaks musical boundaries and yet is strangely relatable by its improbably diverse audience. Despite it all, on any given day when they aren't on the road playing shows, you can still find Imagine Dragons huddled away in a rehearsal room somewhere, banging out song after song in search of the next perfect track. Like most things in Vegas, the band is angled at going big or going bust. For the sake of those who love great music, we hope it's the former. last.fm Pictures of Imagine DragonsShow more imagesMore: Imagine Dragons Topplistorna: Mando Diao kvar i topp Music video with Imagine DragonsHere you can find videos from Youtube with Imagine Dragons - Radioactivewww.youtube.com Check out the artist who photographed the cover of this EP! www.facebook.com www.flickr.com Lyrics below. post.title: This was my music ad
post.summary: Me: Female voice (alto/mezzo soprano) with songwriting/arranging capabilities. I don’t feel “influenced” by music, per say, but I do not like metal and have grown to dislike much of what came out of the 90′s and early 2000′s. I’m not married to a genre, but have been told that my voice has a “bluesy” quality. I have come to accept this. Right now I am listening to Spotify stations based on The Lumineers, J Roddy Walston and the Business, and the Black Keys. Sometimes I like to listen to something like Shovels and Rope or The Old 97′s and I think it sounds like what good alt-country must sound like, but my friend in Nashville says that’s not country, so I clearly don’t like country music. I want to write good stuff, be in a band, and also live my life- so I think a once a week practice is good to start. You: Person of any sex who plays an instrument of one kind or another with skill. Just weird enough without seeming off. You will not want me to scream. You will not try to convince me to start a cover band because I’m sure you probably have a day job. You are either over 30 or extraordinarily mature. You will not try to make me sing the lyrics that your last singer wrote. You have a love of music that enables you to keep from getting stuck in an era, but rather allows you to pull influences from all the eras. I may already have a bass player. His wife says he can come out and play. If you want to be a superstar or don’t have a sense of humor, this is not the band for you. If you’ve read this far you may have guessed that already. I got five replies to this ad the very next day (Craigslist). A couple of crazy ones, a couple of not ideal ones, and one band that may need a vocalist. I replied to the last one. Cross your fingers for me, this isn’t the kind of ad you can just repost. I’d have to switch it up a bit.

post.title: FREQUENCY DRIFT Laid To Rest (Crossover Prog, 2012)
post.summary: Review by Roland113 — This album has shot up my personal chart for 2012 and will most likely end up in the top three. Ok, how to describe Frequency Drift. Melodic drawn out songs in the vein of Gazpacho but with a haunting female vocalist, a world music flair and a lot of violin. I love a good hook, and a lot of times a good hook will push me to buy an album. That was the case with Frequency Drift, I was listening to the album on Spotify and 'Parted' hooked me. Once the song became ingrained in my head, I had to have the album. One sales meeting give away of an iTunes gift card and I had three new albums to listen to on the flight home. Laid to Rest was the best of the three (don't get me wrong, the other two were great as well). I'm not going to do a song by song break down here, instead, I'll focus on the overall feel. As I mentioned earlier, Frequency Drift uses a longer, more drawn out song format similar to Gazpacho and Hogarth era Marillion. They differentiate themselves from their peers by the addition of Antje Auer on vocals providing them with a distinctively haunting female lead. I love her voice, though at times her phrasing needs a little work. In fairness that could be as much from singing in English instead of her native German. There are sections, especially in 'Parted' that are a little awkward. The good news is that this is the exception rather than the norm. The second thing that makes these guys special is the instrumentation, the harp and violin are featured prominently throughout giving it an exotic feel. The violin of Frank Schmitz is exemplified by the Arabic accents throughout 'Dead' and again in the blistering solo in the latter half of 'Parted' . . . and how often do you get to hear harp these days. Adding to the exotic feel, Nerissa Schwarz adds another dimension to tracks such as 'Parted', 'Wish' and 'Copper'. The third great thing about this album is the Middle Eastern feel throughout. I personally love the Arabic chords and tones scattered throughout the album. I think every song has some element of Arabic music ingrained in it. It's not used to excess, rather just the right amount and just the right times. I started this out with the intent of giving the album four stars, but I've convinced myself that it deserves a full five stars. If you like the exotic aspects that I mentioned above don't miss this release.

post.title: Dagens Visa
post.summary: Jag vet att det är brutalt. Jag vet att det är skrikigt. Jag vet att det inte alls är vad man kanske vill höra av en vacker kärleksballad. Jag vet att det kanske är lite väl ärligt mot vissa känslor emellanåt. Men jag vet inte. Är inte livet så..? Lite väl ärligt ibland? En f.d. klasskamrat, en mycket kär sådan, rekommenderade denna låt. Jag lyssnade och väntade mig hårt. Det var hårt. Men det berörde mig. Jag har ju en blogg. Så då kan jag väl lika gärna föra den vidare tänkte jag. Även fast jag inte lyssnat på musikstilen i fråga på nära fem år. Låten berörde mig jättemycket, så det kanske funkar på nån mer.. Jag vet inte... Lyssna om ni orkar. Någonstans i skriken finns en ansenlig jävla mängd sanning. Det tycker i alla fall jag är rätt tufft. På många sätt. http://open.spotify.com/track/7wOInrhCRiWaXdzvQ7oUvN Nattens visa. Håll till godo. Pussgonatt.
